title: #162: Digital Manners & Etiquette For the Modern Man With Daniel Post Senning
description: We've probably all heard of Emily Post, who wrote an etiquette book back in the 1920s that became world-famous. Her work of encouraging good manners and etiquette continues today with her family at the Emily Post Institute. Today on the show I have Emily Post's great-great-grandson Daniel Post Senning to discuss etiquette for men, as well as digital etiquette in this world of smartphones, emails, etc.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
